name: Crazy Parachute
description:
Crazy Parachute is OpenFeint’s Free Game of the Day! Download the Game Channel app to get a FREE game every day!

What really interests you right now with all kinds of competitions around the world?

Have you ever challenged your friends to be the first one to reach the ground after jumping out of an airplane?

That sounds crazy but it’s totally safe with Crazy Parachute, you will find yourself unable to put it down.

PLEASE REALIZE THAT IT IS YOUR 5 STARS REVIEWS, THAT MAKE FURTHER DEVELOPMENT ON THIS GAME POSSIBLE!


Description:

Crazy parachute is so simple and funny that gives you ease and breeze as you race down from the sky. All you must do is jump out of the airplane and reach the ground safely before anyone else makes it.

Features:

- Various kinds of obstacles (balloons, birds, planes) and they are all cute

- 8 kinds of helpful items can be collected for more awesome performance
- The higher level you reach the higher score you get
- New cast of cute characters as well as surrounding elements throughout the game
- Local and global leader board

How to play:

Tap the screen to jump out of the airplane and tap the screen again to release the parachute.

Use tilt control to make your character dodge obstacle.

Be the first one to land on the ground safely and be the winner!
